title: [tanstackdb] Add LICENSE file (MIT) to project root
[tanstackdb] Create comprehensive README.md for mongo-db-collection package
@tanstack/mongo-db-collection - TanStack DB to mongo.do Sync Adapter
description: Full TDD implementation of a TanStack DB collection adapter that syncs to per-user mongo.do databases. Enables reactive client-side state with durable edge persistence.

title: LoadSubset Handler - Tests (RED)
description: Test loadSubset compiles predicates to MongoDB filter

description: Test batching multiple RPC calls into single request

description: Test unloadSubset removes data no longer needed

title: Transport Selection - Tests (RED)

title: RPC Client Core - Implementation (GREEN)
